Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将显示刷新到我的 Happy Place
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Refreshes the display to my Happy Place (My Lister)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 保存我的列表器并设置为“默认”列表器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Saves My Lister and sets as the "default" lister

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在 Explorer 和 Dual 模式之间切换
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles between Explorer and Dual modes

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在水平和垂直模式之间切换
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles between Horizontal and Vertical modes

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在详细信息和缩略图模式之间切换
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Switches between Details and Thumbnails modes

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 像素布局
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Pix Layout (rhymes with six)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 循环浏览视图模式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Cycles through View Modes

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换预览窗格。
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles the Preview Pane. (The 8 are the eyes in lOOk)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换元数据面板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles the Metadata panel

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换平面视图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles the Flat View

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 巨大的模式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Huge Mode

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将缩放级别重置为正常
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Resets the Zoom level to normal

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 放大或缩小文件显示的文本和缩略图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Magnifies or shrinks the file display's text and thumbnails

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 放大或缩小文件显示的文本和缩略图
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: As above, magnifies or shrinks the file display's text and thumbnails

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 自动调整列大小
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Autosize columns

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 更改文件颜色 (1-9)，或重置它 (0)
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Changes the file color (1-9), or resets it (0)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从源复制到目标
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copies from the Source to the Destination

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 从源头移动到目的地
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Moves from the Source to the Destination

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: “Squash”：从源复制到目标并在不询问的情况下覆盖
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: "Squash": Copies from the Source to Destination and overwrites without asking

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制（“跳转”）选定的文件或文件夹
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Duplicates ("Jumps") selected files or folders

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件向上移动到父文件夹
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Moves files Up to the parent folder

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件移动到桌面
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Moves files to the Desktop

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制所选文件的名称。 出乎意料的好用！
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copies the Names of the selected files. Surprisingly useful!

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制所选文件的路径
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copies the Path of the selected files

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件的 MD5 哈希复制到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copies a file's MD5 hash to the clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将完整格式的 html 超链接复制到所选文件到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copies a fully-formed html hyperLink to the selected files to the clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将选定文件的 html Img 链接复制到剪贴板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copies an html Img link to the selected files to the clipboard

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将所选文件添加到剪贴板（不替换剪贴板中的当前文件）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Adds the selected files to the clipboard (without replacing the current files in the clipboard)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将剪贴板文本粘贴到选项卡（创建文本文件）时询问文件名
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Asks file name when pasting clipboard text into a tab (which creates a text file)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 复制为：从源复制到目标，要求一个新名称
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Copy As: copies from Source to Destination, asking for a new name

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 移动为：从源移动到目标，要求一个新名称
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move As: moves from Source to Destination, asking for a new name

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 计算机
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Computer

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 桌面。 依赖 GoExisting 脚本（将脚本文件拖放到 Prefs/Toolbars/Scripts 中）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Desktop. Relies on the GoExisting script (drag and drop the script file into Prefs/Toolbars/Scripts)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 回收站。 依赖 GoExisting 脚本（将脚本文件拖放到 Prefs/Toolbars/Scripts 中）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Recycle Bin. Relies on the GoExisting script (drag and drop the script file into Prefs/Toolbars/Scripts)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 选项卡的原始文件夹
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: The tab's original folder

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开选定文件的文件夹（在集合和平面视图中很有用）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Opens the selected file's folder (useful in collections and flat view)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 转到父文件夹
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Goes up to the parent folder

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 转到驱动器 A-Z
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Go to Drive A-Z

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: System 32
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: System 32

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: Programs x86
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Programs x86

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: Programs
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Programs (think 64-bit)

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开重命名面板
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Opens the Rename panel

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件名转换为小写
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts file names to Lower case

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件名转换为大写
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts file names to Upper case

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件名转换为句子大小写
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts file names to Sentence case

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件名的第一个单词大写
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Capitalizes first word of the file name

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将文件名转换为 Web 安全大小写
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts file names to Web-safe case

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将点转换为空格
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts dots to spaces

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将破折号转换为空格
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts dashes to spaces

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将下划线转换为空格
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Converts underscores to spaces

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 删除空格
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Removes spaces

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 新标签
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: New Tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 撤消关闭选项卡
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Undo Close Tab

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在源显示中向左或向右移动到下一个选项卡
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Shift to the next tab to the left or right in the source display

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在目标显示中移动到左侧或右侧的下一个选项卡
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Shift to the next tab to the left or right in the destination display

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将当前选项卡复制到另一侧
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Duplicate Current Tab to the other side

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将当前选项卡移动到另一侧
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Move Current Tab to the other side

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换锁定或解锁选项卡的格式
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles locKing or unlocking the tab's format

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换导航锁定
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles Navigation Lock

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换从属选项卡（“超级导航锁”）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles Slave Tabs ("super navlock")

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 切换链接活动选项卡
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles Linking the active tabs

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 将光标移动到路径栏
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Moves cursor to the Path Bar

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在左右（或上下）列表器之间切换焦点
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles focus between the left and right (or up and down) listers

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 取消选择
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Deselects

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 开放作品论坛
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Open Opus Forum

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 用谷歌搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search with Google

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用 Google 图片搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search with Google Images

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 用维基百科搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search with Wikipedia

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 使用 YouTube 搜索
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Search with YouTube

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在显示详细信息和缩略图模式之间切换，保留当前选择。 依赖这个脚本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Toggles between Showing Details and Thumbnails mode, preserving the current selection. Relies on this script

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 前往回收站。 依赖 GoExisting 脚本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Go to the Recycle Bin. Relies on the GoExisting script

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 清空回收站。 依赖 GoExisting 脚本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Empty the Recycle Bin. Relies on the GoExisting script

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 桌面。 依赖 GoExisting 脚本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Desktop. Relies on the GoExisting script

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 为当前电影启动 IMDB。 依赖电影数据库脚本
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Launch IMDB for the current movie. Relies on the movie database script

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 通过电子邮件发送此文件
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Email this File

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 通过电子邮件发送此文件，压缩
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Email this File, zipped

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 清除快速过滤器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Clears the Quick Filter

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 在当前文件夹中打开命令提示符
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Opens a Command Prompt in the current folder

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 命令行解释器（“超级运行”）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Command Line Interpreter ("super Run")

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 创建符号链接（“超级快捷方式”）
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Creates a Symbolic link ("super shortcut")

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 文件属性
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: File Properties

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 文件属性
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: File attriButes

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 编辑文件描述
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Edit file descriPtion

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 编辑文件元数据
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Edit file Metadata

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 向左旋转图片
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Rotate Picture Left

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: FTP 快速连接
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: FTP Quick connect

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 编辑 FTP 快速连接通讯录
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Edit FTP Quick connect address book

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 打开一个新的列表器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Opens a new lister

Keys.ChineseFunctionDescription: 关闭当前列表器
Keys.EnglishFunctionDescription: Close the current lister
